info.description: cwb-cads: CWB-based API for Corpus-Assisted Discourse Studies
info.title: cwb-cads

post.summary: Create new semantic map for collocation items or make sure there are coordinates for all items on an existing map.

patch.summary: Patch constellation. Use for updating name / description / highlight-discoursemes.
Patch constellation: add a highlight discourseme.

get.summary: Get collocation analysis of constellation in corpus. Redirects to query endpoint.
Get concordance lines of constellation in corpus. Redirects to query endpoint.

patch.summary: Patch constellation: remove a highlight discourseme.

put.summary: Set meta data of corpus from encoded s-attribute.

get.summary: Get frequencies of segmentation span annotations.
Get all subcorpora of a corpus.

put.summary: Create subcorpus from stored meta data.

get.summary: Get query of discourseme in corpus. Will automatically create one if it doesn't exist.
Get scored items of a keyword analysis.

post.summary: Create new query in assisted mode.

get.summary: Get breakdown of query. Will create if it doesn't exist.
Get collocation of query. Will create if doesn't exist.
Get (additional context of) one concordance line.

put.summary: Create semantic map for items in the provided collocation analyses.

get.summary: Identify who is logged with token

post.summary: Login with name and password to get JWT token
Return a new token if the user has a refresh token
